name: subtrackr
description: Subtrackr is a self-hosted subscription tracker with support for categories, billing cycles, and charts, enabling users to keep an eye on recurring expenses.
features: Subscription logging: Tracks all recurring payments and subscriptions.
Billing cycle tracking: Monitors monthly, yearly, and custom billing periods.
Cost visualization: Displays spending with charts and category breakdowns.
Renewal alerts: Sends notifications before upcoming subscription renewals.
Category management: Organizes subscriptions into custom categories.
Payment history: Records all past payments for each subscription.
Budget planning: Calculates total subscription costs for budget forecasting.
Currency conversion: Handles subscriptions in different currencies.
Trial tracking: Monitors free trials to avoid unexpected charges.
Cancellation notes: Records reasons and dates for cancelled subscriptions.
Export reports: Downloads subscription data as CSV or PDF.
Mobile access: Manages subscriptions from smartphones and tablets.
